languages.text: "Да — страдания Иремерисс будут придавать мне сил на поле боя. Возможно, когда-нибудь я захочу сменить ее душу на эссенцию иного, более достойного противника... но это произойдет еще нескоро".

"It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."
languages.original_text: "Да — страдания Иремерисс будут придавать мне сил на поле боя. Возможно, когда-нибудь я захочу сменить ее душу на эссенцию иного, более достойного противника... но это произойдет еще нескоро".

traits.locale_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “有，伊芮梅莉斯的痛苦会在战斗中赐予我力量。或许有朝一日，我会用某个更加强大的对手的灵魂来替代她的灵魂……但这个目标恐怕不会很快实现。”
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: “有，伊芮梅莉斯的痛苦会在战斗中赐予我力量。或许有朝一日，我会用某个更加强大的对手的灵魂来替代她的灵魂……但这个目标恐怕不会很快实现。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ。イレメリスの苦しみは戦場で俺に力を与える。いずれアイツの魂を、別のもっと使える相手のエキスと入れ替えるときが来るだろうが…しばらくはこれでいい」
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ。イレメリスの苦しみは戦場で俺に力を与える。いずれアイツの魂を、別のもっと使える相手のエキスと入れ替えるときが来るだろうが…しばらくはこれでいい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. El sufrimiento de Yremeryss me dará fuerza en el campo de batalla. Tal vez algún día quiera sustituir su alma por la de otro rival más digno... pero no será en un futuro cercano».
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. El sufrimiento de Yremeryss me dará fuerza en el campo de batalla. Tal vez algún día quiera sustituir su alma por la de otro rival más digno... pero no será en un futuro cercano».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Oh que oui. La souffrance d'Yremeryss décuplera mes forces sur le champ de bataille. Un jour peut-être remplacerai-je son âme par l'essence d'un autre adversaire plus valeureux... mais ce n'est certainement pas pour tout de suite. »
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: « Oh que oui. La souffrance d'Yremeryss décuplera mes forces sur le champ de bataille. Un jour peut-être remplacerai-je son âme par l'essence d'un autre adversaire plus valeureux... mais ce n'est certainement pas pour tout de suite. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hat es. Yremeryss' Leiden wird mich stark machen auf dem Schlachtfeld. Vielleicht werde ich ihre Seele eines Tages mit der Essenz eines anderen, eines würdigeren Gegners ersetzen ... aber so bald wird das nicht geschehen."
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: "Hat es. Yremeryss' Leiden wird mich stark machen auf dem Schlachtfeld. Vielleicht werde ich ihre Seele eines Tages mit der Essenz eines anderen, eines würdigeren Gegners ersetzen ... aber so bald wird das nicht geschehen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sağlıyor. Yremeryss'in çektiği acılar, bana çatışma alanında kuvvet verecek. Belki bir gün, onun ruhunu bana daha layık farklı bir rakibin özüyle değiştirmek isteyebilirim. Ancak bu, yakın zamanda gerçekleşecek gibi durmuyor."
languages.original_text: "It does. Yremeryss's suffering will give me strength on the battlefield. Perhaps one day I will want to replace her soul with the essence of another, more worthy opponent... but that will not come to pass any time soon."

traits.locale_text: "Sağlıyor. Yremeryss'in çektiği acılar, bana çatışma alanında kuvvet verecek. Belki bir gün, onun ruhunu bana daha layık farklı bir rakibin özüyle değiştirmek isteyebilirim. Ancak bu, yakın zamanda gerçekleşecek gibi durmuyor."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
